00043 #ifndef _LUSTRE_EACL_H
00044 #define _LUSTRE_EACL_H
00045 
00051 #ifdef CONFIG_FS_POSIX_ACL
00052 # include <linux/fs.h>
00053 # include <linux/posix_acl_xattr.h>
00054 
00055 typedef struct {
00056         __u16                   e_tag;
00057         __u16                   e_perm;
00058         __u32                   e_id;
00059         __u32                   e_stat;
00060 } ext_acl_xattr_entry;
00061 
00062 typedef struct {
00063         __u32                   a_count;
00064         ext_acl_xattr_entry     a_entries[0];
00065 } ext_acl_xattr_header;
00066 
00067 #define CFS_ACL_XATTR_SIZE(count, prefix) \
00068         (sizeof(prefix ## _header) + (count) * sizeof(prefix ## _entry))
00069 
00070 #define CFS_ACL_XATTR_COUNT(size, prefix) \
00071         (((size) - sizeof(prefix ## _header)) / sizeof(prefix ## _entry))
00072 
00073 #ifdef HAVE_SERVER_SUPPORT
00074 struct lu_ucred;
00075 struct lu_attr;
00076 struct lustre_idmap_table;
00077 
00078 extern int lustre_posix_acl_permission(struct lu_ucred *mu,
00079                                         const struct lu_attr *la, int want,
00080                                         posix_acl_xattr_entry *entry,
00081                                         int count);
00082 extern int lustre_posix_acl_chmod_masq(posix_acl_xattr_entry *entry,
00083                                        __u32 mode, int count);
00084 extern int lustre_posix_acl_create_masq(posix_acl_xattr_entry *entry,
00085                                         __u32 *pmode, int count);
00086 extern int lustre_posix_acl_equiv_mode(posix_acl_xattr_entry *entry, mode_t *mode_p,
00087                                        int count);
00088 
00089 extern int
00090 lustre_posix_acl_xattr_id2client(struct lu_ucred *mu,
00091                                  struct lustre_idmap_table *t,
00092                                  posix_acl_xattr_header *header,
00093                                  int size, int flags);
00094 
00095 extern int
00096 lustre_ext_acl_xattr_id2server(struct lu_ucred *mu,
00097                                struct lustre_idmap_table *t,
00098                                ext_acl_xattr_header *header);
00099 #endif /* HAVE_SERVER_SUPPORT */
00100 
00101 extern ext_acl_xattr_header *
00102 lustre_posix_acl_xattr_2ext(posix_acl_xattr_header *header, int size);
00103 extern int
00104 lustre_posix_acl_xattr_filter(posix_acl_xattr_header *header, int size,
00105                               posix_acl_xattr_header **out);
00106 extern void
00107 lustre_posix_acl_xattr_free(posix_acl_xattr_header *header, int size);
00108 extern void
00109 lustre_ext_acl_xattr_free(ext_acl_xattr_header *header);
00110 extern int
00111 lustre_acl_xattr_merge2posix(posix_acl_xattr_header *posix_header, int size,
00112                              ext_acl_xattr_header *ext_header,
00113                              posix_acl_xattr_header **out);
00114 extern ext_acl_xattr_header *
00115 lustre_acl_xattr_merge2ext(posix_acl_xattr_header *posix_header, int size,
00116                            ext_acl_xattr_header *ext_header);

00118 #endif /* CONFIG_FS_POSIX_ACL */
